content.question: One piece of evidence Las Casas used to support his claim about Native American societies in the third paragraph is that they

choices.label: sought friendly trading relations with the Spanish
were ignorant of Europe before they encountered the Spanish

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
